EV isolated method:
Exosomes were isolated from 1 mL human and bovine milk and three brands of milk-based infant formulas as described previously with minor modifications [7, 8].
[7] Wolf T, Baier SR, Zempleni J. The intestinal transport of bovine milk exosomes is mediated by endocytosis in human colon carcinoma caco-2 cells and rat small intestinal IEC-6 cells. J Nutr 2015;145:2201–06.
[8] Kusuma Jati R, Manca S, Friemel T, et al. Human vascular endothelial cells transport foreign exosomes from cow’s milk by endocytosis. Am J Physiol Cell Physiol 2016;310:C800–C07.
Project_Title: microRNA profiling in Human breast milk exosomes
Project_Description: microRNA profiling in Human breast milk exosomes
